entries.name: Elemental Strike
entries: Choose an element: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder. Once per short rest, when you hit with a weapon attack you can deal an extra 1d6 damage of that element. Scales at levels 6/11/16 to 2d6/3d6/4d6 per DM.

entries.name: Terrain Familiarity
entries: You have advantage on checks related to jungle/swamp navigation (Investigation, Nature, Survival, Perception) in those environments.
